paper.title: New York University: description of the PROTEUS system as used for MUC-3

author.org: New York Univ., New York NY
New York Univ., New York NY
New York Univ., New York NY

paper.venue: MUC3 '91 Proceedings of the 3rd conference on Message understanding
paper.abstract: The Proteus system which we have used for MUC-5 is largely unchanged from that used for MUC-3 and MUC-4. It has three main components: a syntactic analyzer, a semantic analyzer, and a template generator.
